page.title: 06Family Life
page.content: The families in our area are quite well off. The children spend most of their time at{school.}The dads go to {work}and the mums stay at home doing the{housework}although many mums go to work as well. Most families spend their weekends together. They{shop and do various things like going to the{Swimming Pool,}sitting in the garden on a hot summers day and going to different places. On Sundays lots of people go to{church.}In winter it quite often snows. Children go out and play in it. They play on sledges and throw balls of snow at each other. In the evenings families have tea together and talk about their day's work. Sometimes families join up tog- ether and go for picnics or for a walk When it is someones'{birthday}you give them a present to show your love for them.
